name: Chat Master: Prank Text
description:
Are you a prank chat master? Do you want to have endless fun while roleplaying and texting with anyone in insanely humorous scenarios? Make your life so much more entertaining with Chat Master: Prank Text - one of the best texting game apps where you can unleash your creativity and sense of humor with Truth or Lie, Yes or No situations.

To become a great cheat master or prank master, try these texting games in Chat Master: Prank Text and laugh yourself silly by solving roleplay chat games with humorous texts!

Among all the truth-or-lie, yes-or-no choice games, Chat Master: Prank Text is one of the funniest. In this chat game, you may be a prankster who fools your friends, makes your girlfriend jealous, or send your dad a witty joke. You can be anyone you want and talk in any manner you want, even to your boss at work or a scary ghost. Choose your story because each reply results in a different outcome; select the correct answers such as yes or no, truth or lie to complete each level's challenge.

With various prank texts and humorous wording, you will burst out laughing and relieve heavy stress with your friends and family on any occasion. Try it out, have fun with this funny text game, and learn how to pull off practical jokes; you won't be disappointed!

This yes-no game roleplay chat also offers one or two interesting quick mini-games that keep your brain active and sharp to easily pass other choices and texting levels, making you a prank master or cheat master.

Features this simple yet addictive texting game app brings you
- Play-by-play chat games that simulate real-life conversations.
- Various topics and settings to test your reaction and choose how your story will go.
- Endless fun mini-games to master your brain.
- Simple gameplay: choose yes or no, truth or lie, pick your response and your story, and complete all the entertaining chat challenges.

Do you want to be a chat, cheat, or prank master? Or are you just simply bored and want some fun? Download Chat Master: Prank Text now, select your story, and complete all of the humorous conversations and challenges.

Don't forget to leave a comment below and tell us what you think about these texting pranks. Your feedback is highly valuable and helps us create more high-quality chat games. Thank you for downloading, and have fun!

We would love to receive all your feedback to improve our app.
